, Boening will focus on how the law enforcement and intelligence communities handle clandestine sources. "It always troubled me that I could never check out what was being told to me," he said. As they prepared their reports, intelligence officers would often tell you,' I don't believe a word of what I am going to write.' Then analysts cite that report and it drives policy.
